extracted_playbook.condition: Which version of LabVIEW is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to LabVIEW 2024 Q3 Patch 2 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest version of LabVIEW 2024 Q3 Patch 2 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to LabVIEW 2023 Q3 Patch 5 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest version of LabVIEW 2023 Q3 Patch 5 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to LabVIEW 2022 Q3 Patch 4 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest version of LabVIEW 2022 Q3 Patch 4 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: No support for LabVIEW 2021 and prior
extracted_playbook.description: No support is available for LabVIEW 2021 and prior versions. Consider upgrading to a supported version.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), and ensure they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, and report suspected malicious activity to CISA.
